Name: shterm fortress machine weak password
Description: shterm fortress machine has a weak password.will and perform malicious operations such as adding, deleting, modifying, and checking.
Author: gobysec@gmail.com
Impact: 攻击者可利用shterm：shterm口令登录系统后台，可导致黑客随意登陆后台，做增删改查等恶意操作。测试环境补丁信息在2019-6-3及之前
Recommendation: 修改密码，最好包含大小写字母、数字和特殊字符等。
